title: Ornn Bundle
body: When does the sale end on Monday. Like if at 4:30 pm  or 5:30  pm could I get it still?

replies.body:
Heyo!

For the Ornn Bundle, the article quoted the following:

>The Thunder Lord Ornn Bundle includes both Ornn (half off normal purchase price) and Thunder Lord Ornn. It'll be available for 1837 RP from 8/23 at 11:00 AM PST through 8/28.
[-Source-](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/ornn-and-exclusive-forgemaster-icon-available-now)

So it seems like you have until 11:59pm PST on Monday the 28th to get the Bundle.  Given that you are looking to buy it at around 4-6pm-ish, I think you'll be gucci.  Hope this helps you out!  Let me know if you have any other questions!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Eu1WdAYQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-24T17:52:18.829+0000)
>
> Heyo!
> 
> For the Ornn Bundle, the article quoted the following:
> [-Source-](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/ornn-and-exclusive-forgemaster-icon-available-now)
> 
> So it seems like you have until 11:59pm PST on Monday the 28th to get the Bundle.  Given that you are looking to buy it at around 4-6pm-ish, I think you'll be gucci.  Hope this helps you out!  Let me know if you have any other questions!

Sweet. Thanks just needed hat clarification
